main.name: Dima Owens
main.description: I was never excited as I am now, or nothing was exciting as coding…
main.bio: Passionate entry-level full-stack developer with 4+ months of experience building full-stack projects, using MERN Stack & python django. Currently I am very convenient with javascript since I have been working on it for the last 5 months. Seeking a full-stack development role to pursue my passion for developing effective full-stack software products, where later on with improveing my knowledge and experience, upgrade my standing in the company.

resume.skillmessage: Languages and technologies I worked with before, some need review depending on the usage need

education.howItFeels: Now that I am more aware of what I want, if I lived the university time again I would live it a lot different, but also conscious enough not to confine myself 5 years again, and my greatest win was meeting my two heartworm friendships

experience.title: Passionate trainee
experience.feeling: Best 5 months, it worth every single day, learning, practicing, improving, being passionate in what I am doing, realizing that programming is the thing I want to do for the rest of my life, if I have to describe my experiment with 1 sentence it would be: Here I started
experience.projects_intro: Immersive 5 months of full-stack development practicing & overall improved skills, main team projects:

projects.title: HotelCom
projects.description: Website that enables users viewing the available hotels of the decided specifications (city, date, rooms needed), using hotels API, connected with stripe API for booking & using JWT for user authentication.

projects.title: Kiddo
projects.description: A chance to practice new technologies on an idea I wished, an online environment provide safe content for the kids to discover, so we created an android mobile app with kid friendly interface, where kids can have fun and learn. Using python for backend, with django rest framewark.

projects.title: Explore Palestine
projects.description: Website that enables the user book a trip. Here as teams, we exchanged the projects that we had created before (the green field project like the above one) so we picked this website then added many features to it like the ability to chat between users, admin-user with the ability to add new trips, delete users or make them admins, send trip invitation to other user…, payment process using stripe API.
